TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EditorZoneBase extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone
Public MustInherit Class EditorZoneBase Inherits ToolZone

summary.span: 作為充當 控制項容器之所有區域控制項的基底類別。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是特製化的區域類別繼承自類別，並提供一組基本的行為衍生區域包含控制項。The class is a specialized zone class that inherits from the class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain controls. 有一些其他類型的類別; 如需詳細資訊，請參閱概觀主題適用於類別。There are several other types of classes; for more information, see the overview topic for the class. 像其他工具區域，區域看不到頁面是在標準瀏覽模式時，才看得見只有當頁面處於編輯顯示模式。Like other tool zones, zones are not visible when a page is in normal browse mode; they are visible only when a page is in edit display mode. 像其他工具區域區域只能包含特殊類型的控制項，它們設計來包含 (在此情況下，控制項)。Also like the other tool zones, zones can only contain the special type of controls they were designed to contain (in this case, controls). 編輯所包含的控制項區域提供特殊的 UI。The zones provide a special UI for the editing controls they contain. 許多這些 UI 項目都是通用的 Web 組件控制項集合中的所有區域。Many of these UI elements are common to all zones in the Web Parts control set. 常見的 UI 項目 Web 組件區域中的詳細討論，請參閱類別概觀主題適用於類別。For a detailed discussion of the common UI elements in Web Parts zones, see the class overview topic for the class. 因為類別是抽象的您無法直接在網頁上使用。Because the class is abstract, you cannot use it directly on a Web page. 相反地，您必須使用控制項是繼承自類別並實作其行為。Instead, you must use a control that inherits from the class and implements its behavior. 您可以使用衍生的區域中的 Web 組件控制項集合，提供控制項，或可衍生自己的自訂控制項。You can either use the derived zone that is provided in the Web Parts control set, the control, or you can derive your own custom control. 類別提供一般使用者介面 (UI) 包含特殊的控制項，可讓終端使用者編輯屬性、 配置、 外觀及其他屬性控制項。The class provides a common user interface (UI) to contain special controls that enable end users to edit the properties, layout, appearance, and other attributes of controls. 某些屬性適用於 UI 是指動詞命令，例如， ，和屬性。Some properties that apply to the UI refer to verbs, such as the , , and properties. 動詞命令是由使用者在頁面上，執行一般動作，都由在 UI 中按鈕、 連結、 功能表項目或其他項目。Verbs are common actions carried out by users on a page, and are represented in the UI by buttons, links, menu items, or other elements. 例如，使用者編輯控制項的屬性時，他們可以按一下套用動詞命令，以儲存變更。For example, when users edit properties on a control they can click an apply verb to save the changes. 其他幾個屬性會影響所編輯的 UI 中的各個點上顯示文字。Several other properties affect text that is displayed at various points in the editing UI. 這些包括， ， ，和屬性。These include the , , , and properties. 兩個重要的屬性會提供相關控制項的參考。Two important properties provide references to related controls. 屬性為集合的區域內包含的控制項。The property is a collection of the controls contained in the zone. 屬性是控制項中所包含的物件參考-這可能是控制項或任何其他 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項、 使用者控制項或目前正在編輯的自訂控制項。The property is an object reference to a control contained in a --which might be a control or any other ASP.NET server control, user control, or custom control currently being edited. 最後，屬性參考的執行個體物件與區域相關聯，並包含周邊 UI 項目 （又稱為 chrome） 例如標題和框線樣式的樣式特性區域中的控制項。Finally, the property references an instance of an object that is associated with the zone, and that contains style characteristics of the peripheral UI elements (known as chrome) such as title and border styles for controls in the zone. 方法的一些類別專門用來處理其他控制項的編輯。A number of the methods of the class are specialized to handle the editing of other controls. 方法頁面從編輯顯示模式變更回一般的瀏覽檢視表。The method changes the page from the edit display mode back to a normal browsing view. 方法是建立 chrome （週邊 UI 項目例如框線、 動詞命令、 圖示和標題） 括住每個區域中的控制項。The method is for creating the chrome (peripheral UI elements such as a border, verbs, icons, and a title) that surrounds each control in the zone. 方法抽象方法，衍生的類別覆寫它建立的所有執行個體區域內包含的控制項。The method is an abstract method; derived classes override it to create instances of all the controls contained in the zone. 如果，可以由衍生類別呼叫方法的集合控制項中某些以程式設計方式的原因，加上旗標設定為重新建立，並更新集合的 Web 組件控制項的區域變更控制項。The method can be called by a derived class if the collection of controls in the zone changes for some programmatic reason, which flags the Web Parts control set to recreate and update the collection of controls. 方法用來設定的集合控制項`null`編輯模式的顯示模式變更回瀏覽模式。The method is used to set the collection of controls to `null` when the display mode changes from edit mode back to browse mode. 最後，方法用於處理事件時控制項進入或離開編輯模式。Finally, the method is used for handling the event when a control is either entering or leaving edit mode. 例如，這個方法是同步處理的屬性值的便利位置控制項中相關聯的可編輯值控制項。For example, this method is a convenient place to synchronize the property values of a control with the editable values in the associated controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範數個宣告式和以程式設計方式使用類別。The following code example demonstrates several declarative and programmatic uses of the class. 類別是抽象的因為程式碼範例會使用衍生隨附於 Web 組件控制項集合的屬性和它所繼承的方法，來示範類別類別。Because the class is abstract, the code examples use the derived class that ships with the Web Parts control set, demonstrating the properties and methods that it inherits from the class. 程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更在網頁上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 網頁包含控制項。A Web page that contains an control. - 自訂類別，示範一些類別成員。A custom class that demonstrates some of the class members. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的描述。A description of how the example works in a browser. 使用者控制項的原始程式碼來自另一個主題。The source code for the user control comes from another topic. 對於程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要取得的使用者控制項的.ascx 檔案[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)主題，並放置在.aspx 頁面，在此程式碼範例中的相同資料夾中的檔案。For this code example to work, you need to obtain the .ascx file for the user control from the [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0) topic, and place the file in the same folder as the .aspx page in this code example. 程式碼範例的第二個部分是包含的宣告式參考的網頁控制項。The second part of the code example is a Web page that contains a declarative reference to an control. 在頁面頂端附近是`Register`使用者控制項的指示詞。Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive for the user control. 使用者控制項的標記宣告中的頁面``項目。The user control tag is declared in the page with a `` element. 請注意以下``項目是``包含項目控制項，並具有各種不同的標記和屬性來判斷其外觀和行為設定。Notice that below the `` element is an `` element that contains controls, and has a variety of tags and properties set to determine its appearance and behavior. 大部分的網頁中的程式碼示範各種程式設計用法屬性和方法。Most of the code in the page demonstrates the various programmatic uses of the properties and methods. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#1)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是自訂類別，示範如何使用一些類別成員。The third part of the code example is a custom class that shows how to work with a number of the class members. 自訂的類別衍生自使用於區域中的樣板宣告式 Web 網頁的標記。The custom class derives from so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。因此，您會注意到`Register`網頁頂端附近的指示詞未參考的組件檔案。This code example uses dynamic compilation; thus, you will notice that the `Register` directive near the top of the Web page does not reference an assembly file. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#12)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#12)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**從下拉式清單，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** from the drop-down list to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下兩個控制項，其中的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**，編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the two controls, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 當編輯 UI 是可見的您所見的各種宣告式的效果，以程式設計方式使用的類別成員。When the editing UI is visible, you can see the effects of the various declarative and programmatic uses of the class members.

para.span: 如果您想要開發自訂的區域，用於裝載控制項，您必須判斷您是否要提供區域範本支援。

span.span: If you want to develop a custom zone for hosting controls, you must determine whether you want to provide zone template support.

para.span: 區域範本由實作的型別介面，而且不需要如果您想要讓網頁開發人員使用您的自訂區域，來參考在您的區域，在網頁上的宣告式標記內的控制項。

span.span: A zone template is created by types that implement the interface, and is necessary if you want to enable page developers using your custom zone to reference controls within your zone in the declarative markup of a Web page.

para.span: 如果您需要的範本支援的區域，您應該繼承自類別。

span.span: If you need zone template support, you should inherit from the class.

para.span: 相反地，如果您的自訂區域，並將其控制項將會各自獨立，而且則不使用任何網頁程式開發人員在區域範本中，以宣告方式指定控制項的選項會以程式設計方式建立，則您可以直接繼承從類別。

span.span: In contrast, if your custom zone and its controls are going to be self-contained, and they will be created programmatically without any options for page developers to specify controls declaratively in a zone template, then you can inherit directly from the class.

para.span: 如果這樣做，請務必您實作方法，使您自訂的區域，將會運作。

span.span: If you do this, it is critical that you implement the method so that your custom zone will work.

summary.span: 取得 物件參考，其可讓使用者可將編輯變更套用至處於編輯模式的控制項。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that enables end users to apply editing changes to a control in edit mode.

value.span: ，可讓使用者將變更套用至控制項。

span.span: A that enables end users to apply changes to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 套用動詞命令由參考在控制項上的屬性衍生自類別。The apply verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 套用動詞命令儲存目前正在編輯的伺服器控制項的編輯終端使用者編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 中所做的變更。The apply verb saves editing changes that an end user has made in the editing user interface (UI) to a server control that is currently being edited. 根據預設，套用動詞命令會出現在 UI 中以控制項。By default, the apply verb appears in the UI as a control. 按鈕的型別可以是映像、 連結或實際的按鈕。您可以設定這所有的動詞命令按鈕區域 （不適用於個別的按鈕） 中藉由設定繼承區域層級的屬性。The type of button can be an image, a link, or an actual button; you can set this for all verb buttons in a zone (not for individual buttons) by setting the inherited property at the zone level. 套用動詞命令是區域層級的控制項，這表示，雖然可能有數個控制項，每個正在編輯處於編輯模式的伺服器控制項的一個或多個屬性套用動詞命令的運作方式通用從所有套用所有變更加入伺服器控制項區域中的控制項。The apply verb is a zone-level control, which means that although there might be several controls, each editing one or more properties for the server control that is in edit mode, the apply verb works universally to apply all changes from all the controls in the zone to the server control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以宣告方式和以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 第一個部分的程式碼範例示範如何存取以宣告方式在網頁中的屬性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 這個範例會自訂動詞命令的文字。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何存取屬性以程式設計方式，利用切換按鈕以啟用或停用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#4)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**在下拉式清單控制項中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯選取的控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 當控制項和編輯 UI 會顯示，您可以看到代表套用動詞命令，然後按一下按鈕**切換 ApplyVerb 啟用**按鈕，以啟用或停用它。When the control and editing UI are visible, you can see the button that represents the apply verb, and click the **Toggle ApplyVerb Enabled** button to enable or disable it.

summary.span: 取得 物件參考，其可讓使用者取消對處於編輯模式之控制項的編輯變更。

span.span: Gets a reference to a object that enables end users to cancel editing changes to a control in edit mode.

value.span: ，可讓使用者取消對控制項的編輯變更。

span.span: A that enables end users to cancel editing changes to a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消動詞命令由參考在控制項上的屬性衍生自類別。The cancel verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 取消動詞命令取消編輯終端使用者對伺服器中的控制項編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 的變更。The cancel verb cancels editing changes that an end user has made to a server control in the editing user interface (UI). 根據預設，取消動詞命令會出現在 UI 中以控制項。By default, the cancel verb appears in the UI as a control. 按鈕的型別可以是映像、 連結或實際的按鈕。您可以設定這所有的動詞命令按鈕區域 （不適用於個別的按鈕） 中藉由設定繼承區域層級的屬性。The type of button can be an image, a link, or an actual button; you can set this for all verb buttons in a zone (not for individual buttons) by setting the inherited property at the zone level. 當使用者取消編輯變更，無變更的控制項套用至正在編輯的伺服器控制項。When a user cancels editing changes, none of the changes in the controls are applied to the server control that is being edited. 此外，頁面會保留在編輯顯示模式，但隱藏控制項和正在編輯的控制項不再被選取。In addition, the page remains in edit display mode, but the controls are hidden and the control that was being edited is no longer selected. 這可讓使用者以選取另一個而不必變更編輯控制項中顯示模式一次。This allows an end user to select another control to edit without having to change display modes again. 取消動詞命令是一個區域層級控制項，這表示，而可能有數個控制項，每個正在編輯處於編輯模式的伺服器控制項的一個或多個屬性取消動詞命令的運作方式通用取消所有變更，從所有區域中的控制項。The cancel verb is a zone-level control, meaning that while there might be several controls, each editing one or more properties for the server control that is in edit mode, the cancel verb works universally to cancel all changes from all the controls in the zone. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以宣告方式和以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 第一個部分的程式碼範例示範如何存取以宣告方式在網頁中的屬性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 這個範例會自訂動詞命令的文字。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何存取屬性以程式設計方式，利用切換按鈕以啟用或停用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the property programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#5)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**在下拉式清單控制項中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯選取的控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 當控制項和編輯 UI 會顯示，您可以看到代表取消動詞命令，然後按一下按鈕**切換 CancelVerb 啟用**按鈕，以啟用或停用它。When the control and editing UI are visible, you can see the button that represents the cancel verb, and click the **Toggle CancelVerb Enabled** button to enable or disable it.

summary.span: 使用者按一下區域標題中的關閉動詞命令時呼叫，這個方法會結束編輯 控制項的處理，並將 Web 組件頁面的顯示模式返回瀏覽模式。

span.span: Called when a user clicks a close verb in the header of a zone, this method ends the process of editing controls, and returns a Web Parts page's display mode to browse mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供實作基底方法宣告中類別。The method provides an implementation for the base method declared in the class. 實作僅呼叫方法，它會結束編輯處理程序所需的步驟執行。The implementation simply calls the method, which carries out the steps necessary to end the editing process. 呼叫方法傳回的頁面，即可瀏覽模式，並取消編輯任何所做的變更控制項。Calling the method returns the page to browse mode, and cancels any editing changes made to any controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回新物件。The method returns a new object. Chrome 包括下列周邊 UI 項目周圍每個個別區域中的控制項： 框線、 標題列、 出現在標題列，包括選用圖示、 標題文字和動詞命令功能表; 以及中出現的項目內的項目控制項的頁尾區域。Chrome includes the following peripheral UI elements that surround each individual control in the zone: a border; a title bar; the items that appear within the title bar, including optional icons, title text, and a verbs menu; and items appearing in the footer area of a control. 方法會使用傳回物件以建立每個周圍 chrome控制項。The method uses the returned object to create the chrome around each control.

span.span: For example, you might create a customized class to give you more control over the rendering and appearance of the editing UI.

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法在衍生的區域中，您可以建立您的自訂覆寫方法中的物件。

span.span: If you override the method in a derived zone, you could create your custom object in the overridden method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供的參考與區域關聯的物件。The property provides a reference to the object associated with a zone. 當呼叫方法時，它會建立的執行個體類別，而這個執行個體用來呈現週邊設備的使用者介面 (UI) 項目 （也稱為 chrome） 所有區域中的控制項。When the method is called, it creates an instance of the class, and this instance is used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements (also called the chrome) for all controls in the zone. Chrome 項目，個別控制項框線和其他項目包含在其標頭區域中的，動詞命令、 圖示和標題文字，例如其頁尾區域以及其包含的項目。The chrome elements for an individual control include its border and other items in its header area, such as verbs, icons, and title text, as well as its footer area and its included elements.

value.span: ，包含區域中的所有個別 控制項。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供所有的集合參考區域中的控制項。The property provides a reference to a collection of all the controls in the zone. 它會參考兩者提供 Web 組件控制項集合，以及任何自訂控制項新增至區域的控制項。It references both the controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and any custom controls that are added to the zone. 因為集合是唯讀的開發人員想要建立自訂控制項的一般編輯之用，並將其新增至集合應該覆寫方法。Because the collection is read-only, developers who want to create custom controls for general editing purposes and add them to the collection should override the method. 如果您設計自訂控制項，以編輯特定控制項，您應該覆寫的成員介面-方法和屬性-在控制項。If you design custom controls to edit a specific control, you should override the members of the interface--the method and the property--in the control. 覆寫這些成員理由是為了讓您控制項來建立自訂控制，並將其新增至當編輯控制項時，集合，以提供物件參考的編輯控制項若要它們正在編輯的控制項。The reason to override these members is to enable your control to create the custom controls and add them to the collection when your control is being edited, and to provide the editing controls with an object reference to the control they are editing. 如果您想要新增自訂要編輯的伺服器控制項，不是繼承自控制項類別時，您必須實作介面的類別中，就如同針對控制項。If you want to add a custom control to edit a server control that does not inherit from the class, you must implement the interface in the class just as you would for a control. > [!NOTE] > 請注意任何加入至集合的的實作中的控制項方法必須有指派給它的 ID 屬性的值，否則將會擲回例外狀況集合指派給屬性。Note that any that is added to the collection of controls in an implementation of the method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property programmatically. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 程式碼範例的第一個部分示範屬性包含的所有參考網頁中以宣告方式參考的控制項。The first part of the code example demonstrates that the property contains references to all the controls that are referenced declaratively in the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 程式碼範例的第二部分會以程式設計方式存取屬性和每個控制項中會列出識別碼控制項。The second part of the code example programmatically accesses the property and lists the ID of each control in a control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#6)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以按一下**顯示它集合** 按鈕，列出所有識別碼中參考的控制項屬性。When you load the page in a browser, you can click the **Display EditorParts Collection** button to list the IDs of all the controls referenced in the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含文字的錯誤訊息，可以顯示在 UI 中，如果發生錯誤時呈現控制項衍生自類別。The property contains the text of an error message that can be displayed in the UI if an error occurs while rendering controls derived from the class. 如果任何個別中發生錯誤，將會顯示在區域最上方的錯誤訊息區域內包含的控制項。The error message is displayed at the top of the zone if an error occurs in any of the individual controls contained in the zone. 此外，個別控制項可以顯示它們自己的錯誤訊息，會收到錯誤控制項附近。In addition, individual controls can display their own error messages near the control that receives an error. 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce). 方法會覆寫基底的方法，以檢查頁面是否正在載入因為區域中按一下 [確定] 的動詞命令、 取消動詞命令或套用動詞命令。The method overrides the base method to check whether the page is being loaded because an OK verb, a cancel verb, or an apply verb was clicked in the zone. 如果是的話，方法會處理每個個別的案例與相關聯的狀態。If so, the method handles the state associated with each respective scenario.

span.span: A that applies editing changes to a control and hides the editing UI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所參考的 [確定] 的動詞命令在控制項上的屬性衍生自類別。The OK verb is referenced by the property on a control derived from the class. 它是類似於套用動詞命令，當使用者按一下它，它會套用編輯使用者對伺服器控制項所做的變更。It is similar to the apply verb, in that when a user clicks it, it applies editing changes that the user has made to a server control. 此外，編輯控制項隱藏的正在編輯的控制項不會再選取 （可讓使用者編輯另一個控制項），而且頁面仍然會在編輯模式。In addition, the editing controls are hidden, the control that was being edited is no longer selected (which allows the user to edit another control), and the page remains in edit mode. 根據預設，[確定] 的動詞命令會顯示在 UI 中以控制項。By default, the OK verb appears in the UI as a control. 按鈕的型別可以是映像、 連結或實際的按鈕。您可以設定這所有的動詞命令按鈕區域 （不適用於個別的按鈕） 中藉由設定繼承區域層級的屬性。The type of button can be an image, a link, or an actual button; you can set this for all verb buttons in a zone (not for individual buttons) by setting the inherited property at the zone level. 確定動詞命令是一個區域層級控制項，這表示，而可能有數個控制項，每個正在編輯處於編輯模式的伺服器控制項的一個或多個屬性確定動詞命令的運作方式通用套用所有變更，從所有在區域中，並以隱藏除了區域本身以外的所有控制項的控制項。The OK verb is a zone-level control, meaning that while there might be several controls, each editing one or more properties for the server control that is in edit mode, the OK verb works universally to apply all changes from all the controls in the zone, and to hide all the controls except for the zone itself. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何存取屬性以宣告方式和以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property both declaratively and programmatically. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 第一個部分的程式碼範例示範如何存取以宣告方式在網頁中的屬性。The first part of the code example shows how to access the property declaratively in a Web page. 這個範例會自訂動詞命令的文字。This example customizes the text for the verb. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#2)] 此範例的第二個部分示範如何存取以程式設計方式，利用切換按鈕以啟用或停用它。The second part of the example shows how to access the programmatically, by using a toggle button to enable or disable it. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/editorzonebasecs.aspx#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/editorzonebasevb.aspx#7)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**在下拉式清單控制項中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯選取的控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 當控制項和編輯 UI 會顯示，您可以檢視代表確定動詞命令，然後按一下按鈕**切換 OKVerb 啟用**按鈕，以啟用或停用它。When the control and editing UI are visible, you can see the button that represents the OK verb, and click the **Toggle OKVerb Enabled** button to enable or disable it.

span.span: Raises the event and destroys all and child controls in the zone in preparation for a Web page to enter or exit the edit display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供中的基底方法的實作類別。The method provides an implementation for the base method in the class. 主要目的方法是準備網頁進入或結束編輯顯示模式。The main purpose of the method is to prepare a Web page to enter or exit the edit display mode. 方法會終結所有區域內包含的控制項，然後再呼叫基底方法，這會引發中的事件控制項。The method destroys all controls contained in the zone and then calls the base method, which raises the event in the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法在衍生類別中的。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 自訂編輯器區域衍生自類別使用於區域中的樣板宣告式 Web 網頁的標記。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 自訂類別覆寫方法，將區域的背景色彩設定為指定的色彩，然後呼叫基底方法，該命令可破壞所有子和準備進入或離開編輯控制項的顯示模式。The custom class overrides the method, setting the background color of the zone to a specified color, and then calls the base method, which destroys all child and controls in preparation for entering or exiting edit display mode. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#13)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#13)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**在下拉式清單控制項中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯選取的控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 當會顯示控制項和編輯使用者介面 (UI)，您可以檢視該區域含有程式碼中指定的背景色彩。When the control and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see that the zone has the background color specified in the code.

span.span: Overrides the base method to render the body area of a zone derived from the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法呈現的主體區域區域使用，這是主要內容區域的頁首和頁尾區域之間，並包含控制項。The method renders the body area of an zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains controls. 方法會覆寫中的基底方法類別，以提供位址配置和樣式的特定的轉譯屬性 (attribute) 只會套用到區域。The method overrides the base method in the class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply only to zones. 方法會呈現資料表，其中包含主體的整個內容，並在該資料表中，設定不同的屬性值，依據各種條件，包括目前的顯示模式的頁面。The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including the current display mode of the page. 如果有任何包含的控制項，它會呈現的值屬性。If there are no contained controls, it renders the value of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法在衍生類別中的。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a derived class. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀主題。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. 自訂編輯器區域衍生自類別使用於區域中的樣板宣告式 Web 網頁的標記。The custom editor zone derives from the class so that it can be used with a zone template in the declarative markup of the Web page. 自訂類別覆寫方法，將 HTML 加入`
`項目來建立的標頭和本文區域之間的分隔線。The custom class overrides the method, adding an HTML `
` element to create a line between the header and body of the zone. 然後，它會呼叫基底的方法，以呈現該區域的本文內容的其餘部分。It then calls the base method to render the rest of the zone's body contents. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#15)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#15)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**在下拉式清單控制項中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯選取的控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 當會顯示控制項和編輯使用者介面 (UI)，您會看到所建立的標頭和主體的編輯器區域之間的行。When the control and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see the line created between the header and body of the editor zone.

[!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/CS/myeditorzone.cs#16)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorZoneBase_Common/VB/myeditorzone.vb#16)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取**編輯模式**在下拉式清單控制項中，切換至編輯模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can select **Edit Mode** in the drop-down list control to switch to edit mode. 您可以按一下其中一個控制項的標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號），然後按一下**編輯**編輯選取的控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the down arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Edit** to edit the selected control. 當會顯示控制項和編輯使用者介面 (UI)，您會看到文字已變更區域層級為指令動詞區域底部的按鈕。When the control and editing user interface (UI) are visible, you can see the text has been changed on the buttons for the zone-level verbs at the bottom of the zone.

summary.span: 取得對目前正在編輯之 控制項的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control that is currently being edited.
A that is currently in edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有一個一次，以及當控制項處於編輯模式，可以編輯控制項屬性提供該控制項的參考。Only one control can be edited at a time, and when a control is in edit mode, the property provides a reference to that control. 參考的控制項是所參考的控制項相同屬性。The control referenced is the same as the control that is referenced by the property. 因此，目前正在編輯的控制項一律目前未選取。Therefore, a control that is currently being edited is always currently selected.

para.span: 受保護屬性是可存取只有在衍生類別，可以呼叫這個屬性的基底中方法來取得目前正在編輯的控制項的物件參考。

span.span: The protected property is accessible only in derived classes, which can call this property on the base class to get an object reference to the current control being edited.
